item.title: Mail Encryption in Postfix
item.description: in /etc/postfix/main.cf, add: smtpd_tls_security_level = may smtp_tls_security_level = may smtp_tls_loglevel = 1 smtpd_tls_loglevel = 1 Details from From http://blog.snapdragon.cc/2013/07/07/setting-postfix-to-encrypt-all-traffic-when-talking-to-other-mailservers/
